name: Soul Scissors
effectText: If a monster(s) on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Soul Scissors" once per turn.
